mappings.target: :journals/{_id}  a :JournalArticle ; a :Publication ; dc:creator :authors/{authors.#._id} ; dc:title {title}^^xsd:string ; dcterms:issued {year}^^xsd:integer ; swrc:pages {pages}^^xsd:string ; :appearsIn {in}^^xsd:string ; foaf:homepage {url}^^xsd:string .
